title: Sentry (Posten) from Figurines: The Three-Dimensional Design of the Electro-Mechanical Show "Victory over the Sun" (Figurinen, die plastische Gestaltung der elektro-mechanischen Schau "Sieg über die Sonne")
medium: One from a portfolio of ten lithographs
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 15 1/4 x 7 7/8" (38.7 x 20 cm); sheet: 21 x 17 7/8" (53.3 x 45.4 cm)
